info.name: DISCONTINUED Qwant Material design
info.description:
This theme is discontinued because I don’t have time to update it. Now it’s in the public domain, so feel free to fork it.

A theme made for the European search engine Qwant, in the style of Google's apps (because it's their positive point). Work only on computer version.
info.additionalInfo:
2016-03-09: release.
2016-04-04: little improvements.
2016-08-02: support for Qwant Music.
2016-11-11: bug fixes.
